title: StarCraft 2: AMAZING GAME... Until A Sudden GG?! (Solar vs Cure)
excerpt: Professional match of StarCraft 2 that shows what is possible with the new multiplayer balance patch on the new maps. A great game of top level Terran vs Zerg until a rather sudden GG.
